metadata.title: USN-4837-1 -- LibSass vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that LibSass incorrectly handled certain specially crafted sass file. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4837-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libsass0 - 3.4.8-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libsass-dev - 3.4.8-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
